title: Rebirth of the Strongest Mental Power in the Interstellar - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   Calm Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Futuristic Setting   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Military   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Second Chance   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Wealthy Characters
author: Wujian Tianyu   无间天羽
description:
” I owed him once so, wasn’t it enough to pay his kindness back once. Why did I have to like him like a fool ?”

He had high level mental power and high status in the empire. He could be with any one but he had to be with scumbag like him. Could it be that he was masochist?

What he couldn’t accept the most was that Bai Zhouyun betrayed him with a person , whom he regarded half discipline and half friend.

In the end he died under their hands and regarded as stepping stone to become one of the most powerful supernatural in the entire empire.

Now, looking at thin and healthy body in the mirror, corner of his mouth twitched. He unexpectedly returned..>
